item.description: Recommended Books Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones (James Clear) Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World (Cal Newport) Digital Minimalism: Choosing a Focused Life in a Noisy World (Cal Newport) Essentialism: The Disciplined Pursuit of Less (Greg McKeown) Meditations (Marcus Aurelius) The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck: A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life (Mark Manson) Thinking, Fast and Slow (Daniel Kahneman) Why We Sleep: Unlocking the Power of Sleep and Dreams (Matthew Walker)

Platform Engineer - Giant Swarm (May 2020 – Present) / Remote Responsible for building and developing Giant Swarm’s open-source infrastructure management platform (Kubernetes, Go) Cluster API (CAPI) / Cluster API Provider AWS (CAPA) AWS Infrastructure Kubernetes CRD / Conversion Kubernetes Operators ☸️ Software Engineer - Zalando SE (Mar 2015 – Present) / Berlin, Germany Building Zalando’s Kubernetes Infrastructure on AWS Working on Zalando Payments AWS infrastructure becoming PCI-DSS certified Implement a DDos Solution to mitigate cloud-based traffic (AWS/GCP) Developing a Akamai Open Source Library System Engineer - Zalando SE (Jun 2014 – Mar 2015) / Berlin, Germany
